name: Danni K

If you get a chance go see her and get some awesome food while you‚Äôre at it!!

name: Darrion Thompson

text: Recently came to this location with a friend and both had an enthusiastic experience. The employees were super cautious of our dairy allergy and even offered to change their gloves before I could even think to ask! Food was delicious, lots ‚Ä¶More

name: Heidi Atanasovski
text: The pizza is always amazing! I walked in and saw that they had these nice lids for the drinks that do not require the use of a plastic straw. How environmentally friendly! I thought to myself, "man, if only they had a recycling bin too." And lo and behold, there it was. In the corner of the restaurant. 10/10 will come again.

name: Marie Pryor
text: Service was fast as expected.  When asked about an allergen in one of their crusts, the staff did not know the answer.  Staff also didn't offer to find out the answer.  I had to confirm the ingredients on the website.

name: Miss OESSISTAR
text: Crust to thin, should have options. Delicious all the same. Great choices as items. Like the Subway of pizzas. Made to order in 3 minutes

name: Eric Myers
text: I had to leave my first review. Been here multiple times. Food is amazing, when you talk up for yourself.  Everyone, except the guy who pulls the pizza out the oven, hates life. Do your job you teen drama queen. Ingredients are awesome! Add as much as you want and watch these workers puff and sigh! I‚Äôll be back!

name: Ben B
text: Great national pizza chain. Good all around. They have such interesting and fast pizza making ideas. Highly recommend. I had the White Top with a tasty balsamic reduction glaze. Super good!!

text: Awesome pizza!!!!! The staff is very nice. I've been to locations 3 times and each time had great service.

text: Staff was not the friendliest and the food was substandard. I like the concept but the experience was not one I would return to.

name: G. Turner
text: Best pizza!! I eat here at least twice a week and it's always great. Hip atmosphere, the crew is always cool and nice they work hard when its busy.  The brownies are amazing. Not a fan of that purple drink though.

text: Great pizza, very personable with guests. Employees are very good with glove changes and food safety with people who have allergies. The sea salt cookies are delicious! Highly recommend

text: Food was okay but the staff needs to work on it's customer service skills. Did not feel welcome as the staff was putting all the chairs up and stacking them multiple hours before close. There was way better things they could've been doing.. things like taking care of the trash we saw overflowing. Yuck.

name: Ramses Ramirez
text: By far the best thin pizza in Michigan as low as 8.00.

text: We always have a great experience here. I especially love the fact that you can build your own pizza and there is no extra charge regardless of what or how many toppings you have. ‚Ä¶More

name: V _doll

name: the ferocious Ferrox

name: J. Russell
text: Love this pizza. The restaurant is clean. The crew is nice and know how to move when it gets busy. Dana cooked my pizza just right when I wanted it well done! Other places seem to burn it or its not well done at all. Definitely will be back.

name: Sean
text: My new favorite lunch spot, pizzas good, they are pretty fast for a pizza place. The pizza is also delicious and just enough for a single meal. Also, not as many calories as your typical pizza so that's a plus.

name: Jerry Henderson
text: Cool place for a pizza you get to pick the toppings while they make it in front of you. Great staff clean restaurant. Options other than pop to drink.

name: natasha davis
text: Best pizza I've ever had

text: My favorite Pizza place with most reasonable prices in America

text: Pizza is delicious. So excited that I was able to get vegan cheese on it.  If your vegan or have a food allergy please make sure everyone involved in preparing the pizza changes their gloves. I made this mistake and paid for it.

text: The food was good, the s'mores dessert.... AMAZING!!!  Customer service when your picking up an order right before you close......terrible!!!!

text: Love this place. Keto friendly. They have cauliflower and keto crust pizza options! That's huge! I liked the flavor of the cauliflower crust better but both were good. Definitely get the pesto crust ü§§ delicious. For a personal pizza 2 toppings and fountain drink I paid around $11.

text: This place  has toppings galore. Three types of olives, which is great because olive the olives! The regular & hi rise doughs they offer also don't have dairy, so I don't even have to go with the gluten free option to stay allergy safe ‚Ä¶More

text: I ordered a pizza today through the app. It was my first time going to Blaze pizza and I loved it. I ordered the veggie pizza with vegan cheese and it was DELICIOUS and ready when I arrived. The employees were also nice to me. I will definitely go back and recommend.

name: Holly
text: Fast service; great food.  Plenty of options for adventurous diners, but they also have the regular cheese & pepperoni fare. Fresh ingredients, and the store is very clean.

text: I am more than happy to raise this review from 3 stars to 5. I visited this place three times before taking to google reviews to express my displeasure with the lack of toppings provided. I am glad to report since writing that review I've ‚Ä¶More

text: Fresh ingredients, plenty of topping options, tons of flavor. Delicious pizza! The lemonade and "aguafresca¬ø" is very good. It's nice to have great alternatives to soda.

name: Iris iris

text: I had to ask them to add more cheese two times. My husband had to as well. Our son in law did not ask for more, as he ordered a menu pizza and it was very light on cheese. ‚Ä¶More

text: Food was great! Unicorn made sure our pizza was perfect üòÅ One of my favorite Blaze locations!

name: Mathew Attard
text: Diet friendly

name: D Huck
text: I love this place Dana and Ella are always very kind and make the best pizzas ever.  I am a vegetarian they never give me a hard-time when I ask if they can change their gloves or give me a clean cutter.  Very kind, very courtesy and it's always a pleasure to go to this Blaze.

name: Latifah Carter
text: Love this place the pizza is awesome you can build it any way you like. Thin crust and the black cherry soda so good. The staff is friendly and efficient. Dana and Griffin were so nice they made suggestions for my finishes and Dana came to checked on me. I will be back!

name: Muneeb Rehman
text: I have been there a few times. Clean environment, good staff. Food is good. Their pizza is thin crust, single person serving style. This place is part of an outdoor shopping mall

name: Ryan O
text: I have been here a handful of times. Always great, no complaints. Fresh ingredients, clean seating area, friendly staff. I usually get the Red Vine Specialty pizza. Quick lunch option!

name: Blizzkin

name: Ann Ludington
text: Love this place.  Fresh mozzarella is a very nice option.  The staff tonight was spot on and even though I do a build your own I liked that they had a less expensive option for those that just want one or two toppings. I enjoy the blueberry hibiscus drink they have here.

name: Anup Kavari
text: I like Blaze pizza but the blaze people at this location are impatient.

name: Nick D
text: When you tell them extra cheese and they grab a pinch of cheese, and look you in the eyes and say, "anything else", and I'm staring back from the other side of the counter, like yes, "the extra cheese" I just asked for. They clearly train them to be #GreedyWithToppings even when they are charging 10 bucks for the pie.

name: Nathalie Juarez
text: Miranda, Jeff & Tee were very friendly & offered me another free pizza while I waited for my online order after a slight mishap! Highly recommend this place for the awesome fresh ingredients & overall positive pizza environment! üëçDefinitely coming here everytime I'm in Michigan!!

text: This pizza is EVERYTHING!! And way cheaper than the equivalent at Jet's.

name: Moe Chamas
text: The pizza is really good and gets made pretty quickly. The blood orange lemonade is great!  They also have an app you can download which has a reward system and you get a free drink when you sign up.  You earn flames every time you buy ‚Ä¶More

name: Bethany Schultz
text: Pizza crust is just the correct thickness, with double crust and gluten free options available. They have four kinds of sauce and seemingly endless choices for toppings. You only wait a few minutes for pizza, this is a fast casual restaurant so you'll have to retrieve your pizza when your name is called.

name: Monica Lee
text: This place is the best Blaze!! The Build your own is to die for you can mix it up however you like. The staff is friendly even the managers are cool and have fun with the customers. Love this place and the best part is you don't have to wait for 15-20 minutes for it to be ready and served!! 3 minutes wow and taste amazing!!

name: William Vaughn III
text: Similar to Mod pizza establishments. Quick fire oven pizzas in minutes instead of the traditional 20-30 minutes... Great bang for your buck. $8.45 for their premium specialty pizzas!

name: Haidar Algazaz
text: Good pizza but some of the workers that are making the pizza need better attitudes and not look like they hate life. The rest are pretty cool. Speaking of night shift

text: I absolutely love this place & The employees are so Welcoming!!!!! Every time I come In DW & Sam Hooks me up with the best pizza and evens everything out for me & they do their job so perfectly. Thanks to them to this is my favorite place to eat at and I recommend friends to go

name: Elle Massey
text: It's nice to personalize your fresh dough pizza and it cooks fast in a wood burning oven. The staff keeps changing, customer service is declining and prices have risen. $9 for a pizza pie. Lemonades are good and so is the cookie. Hours of operation are good and convenient.

name: Pooja Dave
text: Unlimited toppings. Plenty of choices. Fast. Tasty.

name: Keegan McCallum
text: Don't have to wait for pick up, just grab and go,  convenient ya kno?

text: Best artisanal pizza, it's like a new experience every time I go. I always have in mind what kind of pizza I want, but when I go there I always try something new.

name: Matthew Laeder
text: Fantastic service, great food, and the  place was kept very clean.

name: Akanni Burrell
text: The employees Ella, Sam and Dana are awesome! They always take care of me, other customers with a smile and a great attitude. I love these people!

name: Kevin Egle
